// Materialish Demo
// -------------------------------------------------------------------
// Try out Materialish here

class Welcome extends React.Component {
  state = {
    active: false
  };

  handleToggle = () => {
    this.setState({active: !this.state.active});
  }

  actions = [{
    label: 'Great!',
    onClick: this.handleToggle
  }];

  render () {
    return (
      <div>
        Hello
      </div>
    );
  }
}

return <Welcome />;
